name: BASTROP COUNTY SHERIFF'S OFFICE
sampleDescriptions: Assist the Bastrop County Sheriff's Office with issues related to its US Marshals Service Intergovernmental Agreement for housing federal prisoners.
Assist the Bastrop County Sheriff's Office with issues related to its US Marshals Service Intergovernmental Agreement for housing federal prisoners.
Assist the Bastrop County Sheriffs Office with issues related to the re-negotiation of its US Marshals Service Intergovernmental Agreement for housing federal prisoners.

Assist Bastrop County Sheriff's Office in re-negotiating its US Marshals Service Intergovernmental Agreement to house federal prisoners.
